recent_runway_mentions: Appeared in the CHANEL Fall-Winter 2025/26 Ready-to-Wear Show at the Grand Palais in Paris
Single flaps with adjustable chain strap were brought back in the Spring-Summer 2025 collection
recent_review_keywords_negative: not as structured as it looks online
collectibility_notes: Single flap versions with adjustable chain straps have been brought back
New seasonal colors including navy blue and light gray are available
overall_trend_summary: The Chanel Classic Flap Bag remains prominent in Chanel's 2025 collections with the reintroduction of single flap versions and new seasonal colors. While maintaining its classic appeal, some variations receive mixed reviews regarding structure and weight. The bag continues to appear at high-profile fashion events with numerous celebrities present at recent showcases.
